            PowerShot SX540 HS

            Effortless fun and expert control combine in this 50x zoom, connected bridge camera that takes you on an imaging journey to create and share stunning photos and movies. Ideal for holidays and special occasions.

            Benefits

            • Flexible shooting for every special moment
            • Everything you need for superb Full HD movies
            • Easily connect, share and back up your creations
            • As simple or advanced as you want
            • Designed for comfortable shooting and easy framing

            Detailed Features

            Take a more detailed look into the Canon PowerShot SX540 HS

            Flexible shooting


            Get closer to distant detail or fit more in the scene using the huge 50x optical zoom with 24mm ultra-wide angle. Enjoy crisp, clear shots in any light thanks to a 20.3 Megapixels CMOS sensor and powerful DIGIC 6 processor and capture spontaneous action with 0.13 s autofocus and fast 5.9 fps sustained continuous shooting.

            Full HD movies


            Shoot realistic Full HD 60p movies with one touch of a button and keep footage steady at full zoom or on the run with Advanced Dynamic Image Stabilizer. Capture short, concise, 4, 5 or 6 second movies with Short Clip Movie or use Story Highlights to intelligently combine photos and movies into a movie album.

            Connect and share


            Connect to your compatible smart device with just one tap using Wi-Fi with Dynamic NFC for easy sharing. Use Image Sync to automatically backup new images to cloud services and capture great wildlife shots with wireless Remote Shooting from your smart device. The Wi-Fi Button offers a quick and easy shortcut to Wi-Fi functions.

            Simple or advanced


            Just point and shoot to capture fantastic photos and get a fun HD (720p) bonus movie summary of the day with Hybrid Auto. Creativity is easy with Creative Shot, which automatically creates 5 additional and unique images of your original shot. As your confidence grows, you can take full creative control.

            Ease and comfort


            Experience steadier shots even at full zoom and shoot comfortably for longer thanks to a refined ergonomic grip. Keep track of distant subjects at high zoom at the touch of a button with Zoom Framing Assist and use Zoom Framing Assist Lock to keep the frame rock steady with your subject in focus and automatically centred.

            Product Specification

            Find out more about the Canon PowerShot SX540 HS, its features and what it can do.

            50x ultrazoom with ultra-wide-angle

            Zoom to 100x with great quality

            20.3 Megapixel CMOS

            Smoother 1080p movies

            Record short clips with playback effects

            Easy shooting with a movie summary

            Aperture and shutter speed control

            Share and backup images wirelessly

            NFC simplifies smartphone sharing

            Steady images and movies in every situation

            Fast Continuous Shooting

            Find your subject easily at full zoom

            Powerful DIGIC processing

            Great low-light shots

            Extra control

            Simple access to Wi-Fi functions

            Tag shots using smartphone GPS

            Control the camera with a smartphone

            6 unique images from one shot

            7.5 cm (3.0") LCD

            Transfer to Canon Connect Station with one tap

              Amazing Camera

              I bought this in May 2020 as a GCSE Photography student and it was one of the best decisions I made. It was my first camera and it was really easy to use and great for people who are just starting out. It is also great for experienced people because of the many functions etc. I love this camera and would 100% recommend if you are just starting out or even have prior experience.

                Brilliant camera generally, but lacked USB teathered shooting for stop motion work.

                I bought this camera for my teen daughter and we are very please with it for normal photography. We are disappointed that it does not do USB tethered shooting which we would have liked for stop motion work. My fault really for not doing the research properly first, it just didn't occur to me a new product with many wifi bells and whistles would be missing capabilities earlier models had.
